title: Ticket #4214: condor_run should have -append like condor_submit does
description:
From rust: a request to have condor_run support -append like condor_submit does.

  I've been having users use condor_submit -interactive, now that it works properly, but occasionally it would be better suited for them to use condor_run instead, since they're in the habit of backgrounding processes which tends to cause problems when their autologout triggers on the interactive session. The "-append" option to add things like "request_disk" and "request_cpu" to condor_run submissions would be helpful.
